pages.index: Welcome to Coalquay Leisure: Your Gaming Destination Coalquay Leisure About Us Games Contacts Welcome to Coalquay Leisure Experience the thrill of gaming at Dublin's premier offline casino. About Us Coalquay Leisure is a luxurious offline casino located in the heart of Dublin. Our casino offers a unique blend of classic and modern gaming experiences, ensuring a memorable visit for all our guests. We pride ourselves on our exceptional customer service, providing a safe and enjoyable environment for both novice and experienced gamers. Our friendly staff is always on hand to assist you and enhance your gaming experience. At Coalquay Leisure, we host a variety of gaming events and tournaments, offering exciting opportunities to win big. Our state-of-the-art facilities and premium gaming equipment ensure the best possible experience. Join us for an unforgettable night of gaming, entertainment, and luxury at Coalquay Leisure. Whether you're looking to try your luck at the tables or enjoy a night out with friends, we have something for everyone. Our Games Poker Experience the excitement of Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and more in our dedicated poker rooms. Our poker rooms are designed for both casual and competitive play, with professional dealers and a variety of table limits to suit all players. Features: ✓ Texas Hold'em ✓ Omaha ✓ Seven-Card Stud ✓ Tournaments and cash games Blackjack Try your hand at Blackjack, the classic card game where strategy and luck come together. Our blackjack tables offer various betting limits, ensuring an enjoyable experience for both beginners and seasoned players. Our professional dealers are always ready to help you master the game. Features: ✓ Multiple betting limits ✓ Side bets like Perfect Pairs and 21+3 ✓ Professional dealers Roulette Place your bets and watch the wheel spin in our thrilling Roulette games. Our roulette tables feature both American and European variations, providing diverse gaming experiences. Enjoy the excitement of the spin and the anticipation of where the ball will land. Features: ✓ American and European Roulette ✓ Live dealer option ✓ Multiple betting options Craps Join the excitement at our Craps tables, where fast-paced action awaits. Our Craps tables offer an energetic and social gaming experience, perfect for both beginners and experienced players. Learn the game from our friendly staff and enjoy the thrill of the dice roll. Features: ✓ Professional croupiers ✓ High and low stakes tables ✓ Exciting and fast-paced gameplay Benefits ✔ Luxurious ambiance ✔ Top-notch security ✔ Exclusive VIP area ✔ Wide variety of games ✔ Professional staff Why Choose Us At Coalquay Leisure, we go above and beyond to provide an exceptional gaming experience. From our luxurious facilities to our attentive staff, every aspect of our casino is designed to offer you the best in entertainment and service. Ready to Play? Join us at Coalquay Leisure for an unforgettable gaming experience. Contact us today to learn more about our offerings and plan your visit. Contact Us Frequently Asked Questions What are your opening hours? ✚ We are open 24/7 to cater to all your gaming needs. Do you offer membership benefits? ✚ Yes, we have exclusive membership programs with numerous benefits. Can I book a private event? ✚ Absolutely! Contact us for more details on booking private events. Is there a dress code? ✚ Smart casual is preferred. No sportswear or flip-flops, please. Are there age restrictions? ✚ Yes, guests must be 18 or older to enter the casino. Do you offer food and beverages? ✚ Yes, we have a bar and restaurant offering a variety of options. Is there parking available? ✚ Yes, we offer complimentary valet parking for our guests. Can I learn to play the games? ✚ Yes, our staff is happy to teach you the rules and strategies of our games. Reviews from Clients "Amazing experience! The staff was incredibly friendly and the atmosphere was top-notch." - John D. "Best casino in Dublin! Loved the variety of games and the luxurious setting." - Sarah L. "Had a fantastic time at Coalquay Leisure. Will definitely be coming back!" - Mark T. pages.privacy-policy: Coalquay Leisure Privacy Policy: Your Data Security Coalquay Leisure About Us Games Contacts Privacy Policy Welcome to Coalquay Leisure's Privacy Policy. Your privacy is critically important to us. This policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use and protect it, and your rights regarding this information. 1. Information We Collect We collect a variety of information from our users, including personal data such as name, email address, phone number, and payment details. Additionally, we gather non-personal data like browser type, IP address, and usage data through cookies and similar technologies. 2. Use of Information The information collected is used to enhance user experience, process transactions, send newsletters, and improve our services. Personal data is also used to ensure compliance with legal obligations and for internal record-keeping. 3. Data Sharing We do not sell or trade your personal information to third parties. However, we may share data with trusted partners who assist in operating our website, conducting our business, or providing services to you, under strict confidentiality agreements. 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our site uses cookies to enhance user experience. Cookies help us understand user behavior, track preferences, and improve our services. Users can control cookie preferences through their browser settings. 5. Data Security We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes using encryption, secure servers, and access controls. 6. Data Retention Your personal data is retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law. Once your information is no longer needed, it is securely deleted or anonymized. 7. User Rights Users have the right to access, correct, or delete their personal information. You can also object to or restrict certain processing activities. To exercise these rights, please contact us at coalquayleisure@gmail.com. 8. Changes to This Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify users of any significant changes through our website or other communication channels. 9. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. We encourage users to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites they visit. 10. Children's Privacy Our services are not intended for children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected such data, we will take steps to delete it. 11. International Data Transfers Personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your country of residence. These countries may have data protection laws different from those in your country. We ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during such transfers. 12. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at coalquayleisure@gmail.com.
